text: Rewa is a province in Fiji. It includes the capital city of Suva. It has a land area of 272 square kilometers, making it the smallest province in Fiji. About 108,000 people lived there in 2017. The province has nine tikina (or districts): *Rewa *Noco *Dreketi *Burebasaga *Toga *Vutia *Suva *Raviravi *Sawau Category:Provinces of Fiji
title: Rewa Province
